item.title: Express & Node.js - Getting Started
item.author: aseem.gaurav@outlook.com (Aseem Gaurav)
item.description: If you are new to node.js and want to learn how to create a simple api server in node.js using the Express framework, this is the place to get started. We will start with the basics and in future blogs we will be move into advanced topics which will tell you how to run flutter in a production app. So lets get started. Download and install Node.js (https://nodejs.org/en/)[https://nodejs.org/en/] NPM https://www.npmjs.com/
